About.paragraph: We're a club a of creative and curious students with interest in computer science. We are dedicated to promoting computer science in our comunity.
Why: We're Ladue's only dedicated computer science club (robotics doesn't count)
We participate in interesting and entertaining presentations and activities
Meet and learn from smart and talented mentors
Learn to create your own personal projects
CS is cool so why wouldn't you want to learn about it?

Features.title: Learn
Features.text: Python, Web Development, Game Design, Cybersecurity

Features.title: Create
Features.text: Create fake news bots to subvert democracy to learn about machine learning!
